author: brett
msg: [MRM-1294] start the search period from the *start* of the previous scan rather than the end to discover anything added in the middle. Some artifacts may get scanned twice, but this is a better consequence than not at all

author: josh
msg: Made POI follow the rules for encoding unary +/- operators more closely.

author: brett
msg: [MRM-1294] avoid starting the search period at twice the duration since the start of the previous scan

author: brett
msg: improve test case to check stats
